title: ICYMI | Siya Kolisi surprises Max Verstappen, Range Rover's new luxury Velar - Top motoring stories of the day
text:
Springbok captain Siya Kolisi took a break from rugby and surprised Dutch Formula 1 driver Max Verstappen at the Japanese Grand Prix on Sunday.

Range Rover has unveiled its new limited-edition SVAutobiography Dynamic, boasting 405kW and a raft of changes both inside and out.

Top stories

Volvo is revolutionising in-car technology as it prepares to launch an android-powered XC40 electric vehicle.

Wheels24 reader Natasha Xavier bought herself a brand new Volkswagen T-Cross and had plenty to say about her new pride and joy.

Audi is strengthening its SUV range by adding the latest version of one of its best-selling SUVs, the Q3. Here's what you should know.

description: Range Rover has unveiled its new limited-edition SVAutobiography Dynamic, while Siya Kolisi surprised Red Bull's F1 driver Max Verstappen at the Japanese GP.
